name: Heavy Euro Trailer Drive
description:
Heavy Euro Trailer Drive gives you a realistic truck driving experience! Feel like a real cargo truck driver and deliver heavy packages loaded in your heavy truck. Operate big trailer in the in city to deliver packages and complete different missions.
Driving a big trailer in this Heavy Euro Trailer Drive game may not be as easy as it looks! You must be an expert in parking trucks to deliver packages to the right locations. Park your heavy trailer at the right spot to unload your packages and deliver.

Heavy Euro Trailer Drive: FEATURES

Many cargo transfer missions
Different trailers to choose from
Realistic truck physics
Amazing 3D graphics
Realistic game sound effects
Easy steering wheel controls
